commence(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, AuthenticationException) - Method in class com.msgroup.moviesurfer.security.JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint
This method will be called when the user trying to access protected endpoint without authentication, or when the user send log in request with invalid email or password.
configure(HttpSecurity) - Method in class com.msgroup.moviesurfer.security.SecurityConfig
Configure method defines which URL paths should be secured and which should not
configure(AuthenticationManagerBuilder) - Method in class com.msgroup.moviesurfer.security.SecurityConfig
AuthenticationManagerBuilder takes the userDetailsService and the passwordEncoder to build the authenticationManager, which used to authenticate the user when he tying to log in.
corsConfigurer() - Method in class com.msgroup.moviesurfer.security.SecurityConfig
Global Cross Origins - Cors Configuration
CustomEmailService - Class in com.msgroup.moviesurfer.services
Acts as a service to send emails with or without attachments.

CustomUserDetailsService - Class in com.msgroup.moviesurfer.services
When the user trying to log in , make sure that the user is actually exists so UserDetailsService interface has to be implemented
